thread.title: Carol McGiffin wants 'certain Loose Women panellists' REMOVED before returning
thread.title_full: Carol McGiffin wants 'certain Loose Women panellists' REMOVED before returning

title: Carol McGiffin wants 'certain Loose Women panellists' REMOVED before returning
text: Carol McGiffin wants 'certain Loose Women panellists' REMOVED before returning Carol McGiffin wants 'certain Loose Women panellists' REMOVED before returning CAROL MCGIFFIN has revealed she would be willing to return to Loose Women but only if they removed "certain panellists". PUBLISHED: 11:12, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:35, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 The TV presenter made the revelation on Twitter, just moments after thanking fans for their continued support following the death of her sister Tracy. "Chin up Carol I Loved U on Loose Women Do u think u would ever go back? Hope u Don,t mind me asking xx (sic)," a fan wrote on the social networking site. Not afraid to show her true feelings, the 57-year-old retorted: "Chin is up as far as it will goâ€¦ and yes, I would go back but only if certain panellist were let go.x (sic)." ITV Carol McGiffin has revealed that she would consider returning to Loose Women Related articles
